ModMetaData.name: More Ritual Seats
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to give ideoligions more variety and flavor by adding more ritual seats.
- Prie-dieux: single-tile benches for pawns to kneel on - Box pews: four-by-four pews that are enclosed by low-lying walls - Cushioned pews: pews with upholstery for added comfort - Slab pews: uncomfortable benches that barely pass for pews - Worship pits: dug open pits on the ground for ideoligions that either love dirt or really hate themselves
It also adds building style textures for some of the ritual seats. Some modded styles are also supported.
- Morbid, Techist - Serketist, Hedonist (Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures) - Gothic, Bloody Gothic (ATH's style Gothic and Bloody Gothic) - Neolithic, Ocular, Jewish (Alpha Memes) - Dwarven (Stoneborn - Dwarven Style Pack)
